data.title: B2K - Pandemonium! [Bonus Tracks/DVD] Album
data.meta_description: Pandemonium! is the second and final studio album from the R&B/pop group B2K. The album was released through Epic on December 10, 2002. It debuted at numbers three and ten on both the Top R&B/Hip-Hop Albums and Billboard 200 charts, and spawned four singles: "Bump, Bump, Bump", "Girlfriend", "Bump That" and "What a Girl Wants".
